channel.title: IMP-Mouse commands
channel.description:
multi-applet only one web-browser but multiple windows,frame in that browser red dot
cRed Appletidentifier currentTime //puts a red box over applet so that the //color picker cna identify which applet it is looking at thru trial and error move Appletidentifier milsec x y //schedule a mouse movement clickR Appletidentifier milsec x y //schedule a right mouse click clickL Appletidentifier milsec x y //schedule a left mouse click debug on //log all mouse events for all applets debug off blockfocus on //block focus lost/gain events blockfocus off lostfocus Appletidentifier //send focus lost event gainfocus Appletidentifier //send focus gain event sendtext Appletidentifier text //send keyevents
Genodemon is porting SRL as we speak.
trackback: http://www.impsoft.net/viewtopic.php?p=850#850

item.title: IMP-Mouse commands
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

multi-applet
only one web-browser but multiple windows,frame in that browser
red dot

cRed Appletidentifier currentTime //puts a red box over applet so that the //color picker cna identify which applet it is looking at thru trial and error
move Appletidentifier milsec x y //schedule a mouse movement
clickR Appletidentifier milsec x y //schedule a right mouse click
clickL Appletidentifier milsec x y //schedule a left mouse click
debug on //log all mouse events for all applets
debug off
blockfocus on //block focus lost/gain events
blockfocus off
lostfocus Appletidentifier //send focus lost event
gainfocus Appletidentifier //send focus gain event
sendtext Appletidentifier text //send keyevents

Genodemon is porting SRL as we speak.

trackback: http://www.impsoft.net/viewtopic.php?p=850#850

Read full topic
